snippet: Labor Day may have marked the unofficial end of summer, but you can still savor the flavors of the season in the form of the sweet, refreshing melons that are ripe right now.
abstract: Labor Day may have marked the unofficial end of summer, but you can still savor the flavors of the season in the form of the sweet, refreshing melons that are ripe right now.

byline.original: By JEFF SCHWARZ and GREG KESSLER

headline.main: A Chef in the Field | Melons
